import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const StepOne2=()=>{const{formData,setFormData}=useContext(FormDataContext);const navigate=useNavigate();const handlePrevious=()=>{navigate("/2");};const handleNext=(insured,event)=>{// Get the clicked button element
